definition: brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黃銅礦和黃鐵礦的誘導浮選行爲。

sentences.english: It was an old-fashioned lift, operated by a lever on a brass box.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部老式的電梯，由一個黃銅框架上的槓桿操縱。

sentences.english: Adds silvery brightness to gray hair and neutralizes brassy tones in all shades.
sentences.chinese: 中和所有顏色秀髮的黃銅色，增加灰髮的光澤。

sentences.english: Single-prong solid brass square buckle in gleaming silver-colored metal.
sentences.chinese: 單管齊下閃閃發光的銀色實心黃銅方扣，有色金屬。

sentences.english: Other alloys, such as brasses , are known to possess it to a limited extent.
sentences.chinese: 其它一些合金如黃銅在一定程度上也具有這種特性。

sentences.english: The ropes were glued into some brass tubing to keep the deadeyes even.
sentences.chinese: 在繩索被粘進黃銅管以均衡保持三眼滑輪。

sentences.english: At the bottom there is a drain hole edged with a brass eyelet.
sentences.chinese: 在底部有一個鑲了黃銅小孔的排水孔。

sentences.english: He was such a fan of chewing tobacco that brass spittoons were installed in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他嗜煙如命，以至於把黃銅質的痰盂都放在白宮。

sentences.english: You can order a small cross made of brass or from precious metals with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 你可以定做一個小十字，鑲嵌黃銅或貴金屬與寶石。

sentences.english: This elegant brass case contains Jasmine tea leaves.
sentences.chinese: 這個精緻的黃銅罐內是茉莉茶。

sentences.english: It is available in Brass Plated Black polymer, nickel, zinc etc. on reels or cartons.
sentences.chinese: 它採用黃銅鍍黑聚合物，鎳，鋅等對轆或紙箱。

sentences.english: Large metal top plate of brass and steel lamination provides more active magnetic area.
sentences.chinese: 大型金屬板頂的黃銅和鋼層壓提供了更多的主動磁區。

sentences.english: The brasses need to be cleaned.
Cannons and carronades were turned from brass rods.
sentences.chinese: 大炮和大口徑短炮是用黃銅棒鏇制的。

sentences.english: An investigation is made of the catalyzing behavior of silver ions in bacterial leaching of chalcopyrite.
sentences.chinese: 對銀離子催化細菌浸出黃銅礦進行了研究。

sentences.english: I used Styrene Solid rod and brass rod to manufacture the Single Bollards.
sentences.chinese: 我用苯乙烯堅實的控制棒和黃銅棒製造的單一護柱。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
